description:
Critical Reading > Sentence Completions

Choose the word or set of words that, when inserted in the sentence, best fits the meaning of the sentence as a whole.

Instead of praising the ------- employees who worked late every night to ensure that the project was finished on time, the manager criticized them for not having ------- the work sooner.

(A) assiduous . . complicated

(B) lethargic . . finalized

(C) meticulous . . discarded

(D) diligent . . completed

(E) neglectful . . overlooked 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

description:
《伸冤人》The Equalizer
导演：安东尼·福奎阿
编剧：理查德·温克
国家地区：美国
主演：丹泽尔·华盛顿/科洛·莫瑞兹
上映日期：2014年9月26日（美国）

预告片：

剧情简介：
《伸冤人》原是一档于1985—1989年期间在美国CBS电视台播出的犯罪系列剧集。男主角是一名私家侦探，他是一位老练的前政府特工，为了弥补过去所犯下的过错，而与法律系统的漏洞过失进行斗争。
“The Equalizer” was once a crime series during 1985-1989 by America CBS television broadcast. The actor is a private detective who is also a veteran of the government agents. In order to make up for his past mistakes ,he fight against the vulnerabilities and negligence of the legal system.

description:
The 2013-2014 broadcast television season has come to an end.2013-2014节目季已经结束。

Which shows came out on top among the advertiser-friendly demographic of adults 18-49 years old?哪些节目在广告商最中意的18-49岁人群收视中排行最高？

With each rating point equaling 1.3 million viewers, here's a rundown of the the top 50(ish, note the ties) programs on ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX and The CW...2013-2014年度的剧集平均收视人数为130万，我们给大家排出了收视最高的50部，包括ABC、NBC、CBS、FOX和CW..(= =嗯...CW就是拖后腿的...)
